metadata.description: A curated marketplace of Claude Code plugins and skills for enhanced development workflows

plugins.name: code-refactor-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyzes codebases for refactoring opportunities across Go, Python, TypeScript/React and other languages. Identifies large files, complex code, poor organization, and provides actionable recommendations.

plugins.name: devloop
plugins.description: Token-conscious feature development workflow with specialized agents, strategic model selection (opus/sonnet/haiku), language-specific skills, and automated hooks for Go, React, and Java projects
